Name: Hide and Seek
About the game: In this game, young children like to play Hide and Seek. They are divided into two teams. One team hides in complete darkness and the other team searches for them with a flashlight. Then they switch roles. Each team has its own peculiarities. If you are hiding, you have energy, lives, traps, and you can lock yourself in closets. When you search, you have to constantly charge your flashlight and look for keys to open the cabinets.
